newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romania unemployment 6.2 pct in August vs 6.6 pct.
newsitem.headline: Romania unemployment 6.2 pct in August vs 6.6 pct.

text.p: Romania's unemployment rate fell to 6.2 percent in August from 6.6 percent the previous month, the Labour Ministry said on Tuesday.
It said the jobless rate continued to drop due to seasonal work in agriculture and construction and the growth of the private sector, which absorbed some of the unemployed.
NOTE -- Romania has a workforce of 11.235 million. The jobless rate is expected to drop to 8.3 percent this year from 8.9 percent in 1995. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
